description: Zerodha is India's largest stock brokerage platform that offers discount broking, zero brokerage on equity delivery, and tools for stock market investing and trading.

faqs.a: Zerodha provides an online platform to invest in stocks, mutual funds, bonds, and trade derivatives at low brokerage fees.

faqs.q: Do you have a free tier?
faqs.a: Opening an account on Zerodha is free. Equity delivery trades carry zero brokerage.
Zerodha is built for stock market investors, traders, beginners, and long-term wealth builders.
Equity delivery is free. Intraday and F&O trades charge â‚¹20 per order or 0.03%, whichever is lower.
